metadata.title: CVE-2021-23977 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Firefox for Android suffered from a time-of-check-time-of-use vulnerability that allowed a malicious application to read sensitive data from application directories. Note: This issue is only affected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 86.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
